Pick up phone
I would walk to my room where my phone is plugged in, pick up the phone, press the answer button, and lift the phone to my ear.


[WALK] <bedroom> (1.67)
[WALK] <phone> (1.1000)
[FIND] <phone> (1.1000)
[GRAB] <phone> (1.1000)
[TURNTO] <phone> (1.1000)
[LOOKAT] <phone> (1.1000)
[FIND] <button> (1.1001)
[PUSH] <button> (1.1001)
